snippet: The Vatican announced that Pope Benedict XVI would begin posting messages on Twitter next week under the handle @pontifex, a term for the pope that means “bridge builder” in Latin.
abstract: Vatican announces that Pope Benedict XVI will begin posting messages on Twitter; move is aimed at drawing in Roman Catholic Church's followers, particularly young people.

byline.original: By GAIA PIANIGIANI and RACHEL DONADIO
byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani reported from Vatican City, and Rachel Donadio from Rome.

lead_paragraph: The Vatican announced that Pope Benedict XVI would begin posting messages on Twitter next week under the handle @pontifex, a term for the pope that means “bridge builder” in Latin.

headline.main: Twitter Has a New User: The Pope
headline.print_headline: Twitter Has A New User: The Pope
